name: Amulet of Vitality
description: A small ruby pendant that glows ever so slightly on a beautiful silver chain.
benefit: Hit points increased by 3.

name: Ring of Protection
description: Widely available and sought after, these magical rings impart magical protection on to the wearer.
benefit: Armor and saving throws increased by 1.

name: Cloak of Protection
description: Widely available and sought after, these magical cloaks impart magical protection on to the wearer.
benefit: Armor and saving throws increased by 1.

name: Blunting Belt
description: This belt is comprised of several layers of leather, wound around small round pieces of metal. The resulting effect is not unlike brigandine.
benefit: Physical damage is reduced by 1 point.

name: Boots of Speed
description: Lighter than a single feather, these boots allow amazing feats of movement with a simple click of the heels.
benefit: Your movement can be doubled 3 times per day.

name: Executioner's Hood
description: Covered in dried blood and soot, this hood strikes fear into all sentient creatures.
benefit: Damage rolls increased by 1.
additional: If wielding an axe, damage rolls increased by 2.

name: Sanguine Great Helm
description: This great helm appears to be rusted from the sheer amount of dried blood covering it.
benefit: Dealing damage with melee weapons restores 1 hit point.

name: Stag Helm
description: This large helm is forged in the shape of a stag's head, complete with antlers of gleaming silver.
benefit: Attack rolls increased by 1.
additional: Immune to Web.

name: Tempered Helm
description: This helm is dented and scratched - it looks like it's seen plenty of rough use. When you put it on you feel a powerful rage start to descend on you.
benefit: Melee damage increased by 1 for every kill for 3 rounds. Enemies must be a resonable challenge in order to receive the bonus.
additional: Saving throws increased by 1.

name: Pilgrims Lasting Vigil
description: This helmet bears a sunburst emblem similar to that of Sarenrae's sun halo.
benefit: Armor and attack rolls increased by 1.

name: Amulet of Summer Solstice
description: This bronze amulet depicts an embossed sun emblem emanating rays of light.
benefit: Fire damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: You can cast Light once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Rotward Amulet
description: A large peridot adorns this amulet, a feeling of heightened vigor is felt while wearing it.
benefit: You have advantage on saving throws vs Poison and Disease.

name: Milani's Tears
description: This blood-red garnet in the shape of a tear hangs from a rune enscribed golden necklace.
benefit: Healing spells remove the entangled, stuck, and paralyzed afflictions.
additional: Upon your death you cast Mass Cure (automatic).

name: The Third Eye
description: No mere ostentation, the amethyst at the icon's center acts as a kind of lens, revealing signs of weaknesses and secrets of those viewed through its facets.
benefit: You deal a critical hit if you roll a 19 or better on an attack roll.

name: Soulward Amulet
description: This brilliant bloodstone amulet has a strange aura about it. Holding it close to your ear you think you hear a soft, calming voice.
benefit: Drain abilities can be resisted with a constitution saving throw of DC15.

name: Boltcatchers
description: Iron bracers forged with multiple lightning strikes, creating something beautiful and powerful.
benefit: Electrical damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Taking electrical damage charges your weapon, for the next 5 rounds you deal an extra 1d4 electrical damage.

name: Corroded Vambraces
description: Crafted from the disgarded carapace of a large crustacean, these vambraces provide remarkable protection while oozing acid.
benefit: Acid damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Melee weapons deal an additonal 1 point of acid damage.

name: Healing Hands
description: These well made leather gloves have a rose symbol on their palms, even when cleaned they appear as if stained by blood.
benefit: Healing spell restores and additional 3 hit points.

name: Forgemaster's Gloves
description: These gloves are made of a thick, flame-retardant leather that can protect the wearer's hands from the heat of the forge. They're warm to the touch.
benefit: Fire damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Melee weapons deal an additonal 1 point of fire damage.

name: Desna's Vambraces
description: Vambraces blessed by Desna's herald, The Night Monarch. These vambraces are fashonied from black leather and bear Dena's symbol.
benefit: Scoring a critical hit grants 1 Luck Token.

name: Sigil of the Arcane
description: A small emerald decorates this beautiful copper ring.
benefit: You fire an additional bolt with the Magic Missile spell.

name: Killer's Work
description: This rusted iron bangle is covered in dried blood.
benefit: You deal a critical hit if you roll a 19 or better on an attack roll with daggers.

name: Seal of Faith
description: This thick iron band is dented, scratched, and studded with small pearls.
benefit: Add your level to healing done by the Cure Wounds spell.

name: Ring of Toughness
description: A large amethyst decorates this dark iron band.
benefit: Hit points increased by 3 and you take 1 less damage from physical attacks.

name: Finality's Claim
description: A large onyx in the shape of a skull decorates this golden band.
benefit: You gain a +4 to your death timer roll. If you roll a 19 or better you rise with 1 hit point.

name: Ring of Eternal Funding
description: This plain silver band contains a power that belies its simple appearance, it allows the wearer to pursue special interests without being tied to a particular patron.
benefit: At the beginning of each day gain 2d8 silver pieces. Ring must be worn for the previous 24 hours in order to grant the benefit.

name: Ring of Frigid Claim
description: This ring is heavy and rough-hewn. It looks like it was cast from a poorly-refined lump of silver.
benefit: You deal an additonal 1 point of cold damage with weapons and spells.
additional: Fire damage is reduced by 3 points.

name: Ring of Searing Flames
description: This ring is light and fine-hewn. It looks like it was cast from fine copper with no impurities.
benefit: You deal an additonal 1 point of fire damage with weapons and spells.
additional: Cold damage is reduced by 3 points.

name: Bilestompers
description: The edges of these leather boots show signs of corrosion, but not enough to have damaged them.
benefit: Acid damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Additionally you can walk on acidic surfaces without taking damage.

name: Dead Man Stands
description: These thick leather boots oddly show no sign of wear and tear or stains.
benefit: Dying rolls reduced to 15 in order to stablize.

name: Fenwalkers
description: These comfortable, close-fitting boots are ideal for traversing difficult terrain. Each buckle is etched with protective runes.
benefit: You have advantage on saving throws vs Entangle, Stuck, and Paralyze.

name: Boots of Stability
description: These heavy boots are extremely comfortable and will not tip over, no matter how hard one tries to do so.
benefit: Immune to being knocked down.
additional: You have advantage on skill checks for balancing.

name: Greenstained Boots
description: These leather boots were deeply stained with green dye to give them their distinctive appearance.
benefit: Immune to flora entanglement.
additional: You can cast Good Berry once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Trollhide Belt
description: This belt has been crafted from the mossy hide of a forest troll with intertwined vines and leaves.
benefit: Regenerate 1 hit point each round of combat.
additional: Taking acid or fire damage stops the regeneration effect for 5 rounds.

name: Berserker's Belt
description: Multiple strong leather straps with crossed axes as buckles abdorn this belt.
benefit: Damage rolls with melee weapons increase by 2.
additional: If hit in combat, roll 1d4. On a 4 you enter a frenzy where the damage increases to 4 and your AC is reduced by 2. Frenzy lasts until the end of combat.

name: Nature's Embrace
description: This belt is made of thin, interwoven vines, forming a sturdy and elegant loop imbued with protective magic.
benefit: Cold and fire damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: You can cast Barkskin once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Girdle of Mortal Protection
description: Though a simple band of dark leather, this particular girdle provides defense against otherwise deadly blows.
benefit: Once per day you may choose to lesson a critical blow to a normal attack.

name: Spellkeeper
description: The creator of this belt imbued it with shifting magical properties; the arcane or the divine.
benefit: At the beginning of each day gain a random level 1 spell scroll from the Priest's or Wizard's spell list.

name: Mantle of Wreathing Flame
description: This crimson red cloak with golden trim radiates warmth when worn.
benefit: Fire damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Physical attacks deal an extra 1d4 fire damage.

name: Cloak of Minor Missiles
description: While this cloak appears mudane, though a slight shimmer of blue and violet hint to something more.
benefit: Bows, crossbows, and the Magic Missile spell deal an additional 1 point of damage.

name: Cape of Withdrawl
description: This cape mimics the appearance of fog, both substantial and insubstantial simultaneously.
benefit: Armor increased by 1.
additional: You can cast Misty Step once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Cloak of Comfort
description: Magical runes line the inside of this rather simple looking heavy cloak.
benefit: Hit points increased by 3.
additional: Physical damage is reduced by 1 point.

name: Cloak of Many Feathers
description: A few silver pinions are scattered among the red, black, and brown feathers of the cloak. The overall pattern brings to mind autumn foliage.
benefit: You have the magical benefits of the spell Feather Fall at all times.

name: Ioun Stone, Garnet
description: A strangly shaped gemstone the size of a pebble that resembles garnet.
benefit: Attack rolls increased by 1.

name: Ioun Stone, Amber
description: A strangly shaped gemstone the size of a pebble that resembles amber.
benefit: Damage rolls increased by 1.

name: Ioun Stone, Peridot
description: A strangly shaped gemstone the size of a pebble that resembles peridot.
benefit: Armor increased by 1.

name: Ioun Stone, Alexandrite
description: A strangly shaped gemstone the size of a pebble that resembles alexandrite.
benefit: Hit points increased by 3.

name: Ioun Stone, Iolite
description: A strangly shaped gemstone the size of a pebble that resembles iolite.
benefit: Spellcasting checks increased by 1.

name: Ioun Stone, Aquamarine
description: A strangly shaped gemstone the size of a pebble that resembles aquamarine.
benefit: Can hold 1 tier 1 spell to be cast with command word.

name: Apprentice's Tome
description: This tome has minimal wear and tear.. only a few dried up splotches of blood on the cover.
benefit: The DC to learn spells from this spell book are reduce by 1.
additional: You can learn or cast any of the spells contained as if they were scrolls.

name: Acolyte's Primer
description: The cover appears to be made of mummified skin, covered in dust and dried blood.
additional: You can cast any of the spells contained as if they were scrolls.
